Posts.Content: Hello Pradapee, Cannot give advise but we' re in the same boat...so to speak. I have Melanoma mets to spine and a rib , noticed in CT scan about seven weeks back. After RAPPID ARC radiotherapy ,...which really eased the pain and let me to walk and move better, I had spinal cement injected into damaged vertebra...which worked well. Oncologist is trying to place me in another advanced stage clinical trial. Has advised Zometa or Xgeva to help bone restructuring...infusions every three weeks. Reading the side effects of Zometa is ..as you say... Discouraging, and nether seem to actually fight the cancer. Being that I am"self Pay" and without insurance, cost is $2,900 for one and $1'500 for other per infusion....yes extreme sticker shock, but response rates are low so I,m hesitant... and if there is a natural supplement that might improve the bone damage, then I,ll be up for it. Have you had radiotherapy to contain spine and pelvis? So sorry cannot be of help, but I'll be following the thread with high interest... Best wishes to you. Bob
